name: Micro Powder Box (Experiment)
description:
This game was a small project I made to experiment with MicroStudio.

Due to how underpowered and limited the engine is, the canvas resolution and content of the game is pretty low.

Currently, the game features basic powder and liquid simulation along with 3 materials: Sand, Stone and Water

Controls:

  • LMB - Draw materials
  • RMB - Eraser
  • Z, X and C - Select material
